page.title: 03AGRICULTURE
page.content: There are twelve farms in the area. It is mainly mixed farming.There is rough pasture,hay and grass for silage for the dairy cows. The arable farming is mainly barley,wheat and oil seed rape. There are some horticultural crops such as potatoes. One farm,Summerfields,specialises in nursery plants. . The barley is used to supply the breweries at Burton on Trent. The farmers have recently had to cut down on the size of their dairy herds because of E.E.C. regulations. This has caused a lot of anger and even some financial hardship for those farmers who depend on selling the milk they produce.
